#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
static int  gcd(int a, int b){
    a = abs(a); b = abs(b);
    return (b==0) ? a : gcd(b, a%b);
  }
long long int power(long long int x, long long int y)
{
    int res = 1;      // Initialize result
    x = x % mod;  // Update x if it is more than or
                // equal to p
    while (y > 0)
    {
        // If y is odd, multiply x with result
        if (y & 1)
            res = (res*x) % mod;
        // y must be even now
        y = y>>1; // y = y/2
        x = (x*x) % mod;
    }
    return res;
}
int main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int a[100023],n;
        char s='n';
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        if(a[0]<a[1])
            s='i';
            else
            s='d';
        int c=0;
       // printf("ini=%c\n",s);
        for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++){
            if(a[i]<a[i+1]&&s=='d'){
                c+=1;
                //printf("s is d now=%c\n",s);
            s='i';}

            if((a[i]>a[i+1])&&(s=='i')){
                c+=1;
                //printf("a[i]=%d a[i+1]=%d s is i now=%c\n",a[i],a[i+1],s);
            s='d';}
        }
        printf("%d\n",c);
    }
}
